name: Dash & Retry
description:
Dash & Retry is a game made during the "Pixel Weekend Jam #1".

It's a Player vs Player game playable with two Xbox Controllers.

You play two mage who fight each other. You will be able to Dash and propulse your enemy out of the map or into the flame traps.

Inputs :

LeftStick : Move Your Character

RB hold : Prepare your Dash

RB up : Dash

RightStick : Move your Dash direction

R (On Keyboard) : Restart

Alt + F4 : Quit

Team :

Game Design, Programmation : Gras Valentin

Game Design, Art : Laborde Hugues
